mean_cn: n.交谈，演讲，论述，讲道（读作/ˈdɪsˌkɔrs/）；  v.演讲，谈论（读作/dɪsˈkɔrs/）
mean_en: "a long and serious treatment or discussion of a subject in speech or writing; the use of language in speech and writing in order to produce meaning; language that is studied
sentence: We had a long discourse about our views on life.
sentence_trans: 我们讨论了很久各自对生活的看法。
word_etyma: dis 分开、离、散 + course课程 → 离散的课程 → 演讲
